      public Word(Tile[] tiles, int row, int col, boolean vertical)
      The Word function returns the word as a string.

      Parameters:
      tiles - Store the tiles that make up the word
      row - Store the row number of the word
      col - Set the column of the word
      vertical - Determine whether the word is vertical or horizontal
